titleStmt.title: John Boyle to George D. Prentice
CWG14188

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
305
Nov. 17th 3
Hon. Geo. D. Prentice
Louisville -- Ky.
Sir,
The accompanying letter is enclosed to you as Capt. Norris' address is not known -- and I beg you will forward it ot him.
It is also an answer to the request in your favor to the Governor of the 13th inst. It is impossible at present to comply with the request, as no vacancy exists, of the ranks mentioned.

Respectfully
Your obt Servt
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen. of Ky.
